QuestData.Title: Cryptograms and Keys
QuestData.Description:
The repositories of knowledge within Korthia have layers of security--for very good reasons.
Each vault requires cryptographs in order to decode and disable the barriers. They are, for lack of a better term, the keys to every secret.
Search outside the Vault for cryptographs stolen by the Mawsworn and return them to me. I will keep them, and the secrets they protect, safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve $1oa Stolen Cryptographs from outside the Vault and Seeker's Quorum.
QuestData.RewardText: I am deeply grateful for your service in keeping our secrets from the Jailer.
